verses.text: I will give thanks \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* whole heart. I will tell \w of|strong="H4210"\w* all \w your|strong="H1732"\w* marvellous works.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* glad \w and|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*. \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sing \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* name, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Most|strong="H3068"\w* \w High|strong="H6381"\w*.
When \w my|strong="H8055"\w* enemies turn back, \w they|strong="H8034"\w* stumble \w and|strong="H8055"\w* perish \w in|strong="H8034"\w* \w your|strong="H2167"\w* presence.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* have maintained \w my|strong="H7725"\w* just \w cause|strong="H7725"\w*. \w You|strong="H6440"\w* sit \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* throne judging righteously.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* rebuked \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nations. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* destroyed \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wicked|strong="H6213"\w*. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* blotted \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* name \w forever|strong="H3427"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* ever.

\w The|strong="H8034"\w* enemy \w is|strong="H8034"\w* overtaken \w by|strong="H8034"\w* endless ruin. \w The|strong="H8034"\w* very \w memory|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* cities \w which|strong="H1471"\w* \w you|strong="H1471"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* overthrown \w has|strong="H1471"\w* perished.

\w But|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H5892"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* reigns \w forever|strong="H5331"\w*. \w He|strong="H5892"\w* \w has|strong="H5892"\w* prepared \w his|strong="H1992"\w* throne \w for|strong="H5892"\w* judgement.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w judge|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w world|strong="H5769"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* righteousness. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* administer judgement \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* peoples \w in|strong="H3427"\w* uprightness.

\w The|strong="H8199"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* \w also|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H3816"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* high tower \w for|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* oppressed; \w a|strong="H3068"\w* high tower \w in|strong="H8398"\w* times \w of|strong="H8199"\w* trouble.

\w Those|strong="H1961"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* know \w your|strong="H3068"\w* name \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H1961"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H1961"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* forsaken \w those|strong="H1961"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* seek \w you|strong="H1961"\w*.

Sing \w praises|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* dwells \w in|strong="H3068"\w* Zion, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w declare|strong="H3045"\w* amongst \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w what|strong="H3045"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* done.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* avenges blood remembers \w them|strong="H5046"\w*. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* doesn’t forget \w the|strong="H3068"\w* cry \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* afflicted.

\w Have|strong="H3588"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H7911"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. See \w my|strong="H2142"\w* affliction \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H6041"\w* hate \w me|strong="H7911"\w*, \w and|strong="H6041"\w* lift \w me|strong="H7911"\w* up \w from|strong="H1818"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* gates \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w death|strong="H1818"\w*,

\w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w show|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H7311"\w*. \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* salvation \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Zion.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* nations \w have|strong="H1323"\w* sunk down \w in|strong="H8416"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* pit \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w*. \w In|strong="H8416"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* net \w which|strong="H5608"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* hid, \w their|strong="H3605"\w* own foot \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w taken|strong="H5608"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H1471"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w himself|strong="H6213"\w* known. \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w has|strong="H1471"\w* \w executed|strong="H6213"\w* judgement. \w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w wicked|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H6213"\w* snared \w by|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w work|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H6213"\w* own hands. \qs Meditation. Selah.\qs*

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w turned|strong="H3068"\w* \w back|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Sheol,\f + \fr 9:17 \ft Sheol is the place of the dead.\f* \w even|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* nations \w that|strong="H3045"\w* forget \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* needy \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* \w not|strong="H7725"\w* \w always|strong="H3605"\w* \w be|strong="H1471"\w* forgotten, nor \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hope \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* poor perish \w forever|strong="H3605"\w*.

Arise, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*! Don’t \w let|strong="H3808"\w* man prevail. \w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nations \w be|strong="H3808"\w* judged \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* sight.

\w Put|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w fear|strong="H6440"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. Let \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* know \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* only men. \qs Selah.\qs*
